name: Amazon Essentials Men's Cargo Fleece Jogger Sweatpant with Relaxed Fit
product_description: These men's cargo sweatpants feature a relaxed fit through the hip, thigh, and leg, sitting comfortably at the waist. Made from cozy, midweight brushed fleece in a cotton-polyester blend, they're perfect for all-day wear. The classic jogger silhouette has a tapered leg and ribbed cuffs for effortless style, while two cargo pockets with hook-and-loop closures offer practical storage for essentials. An elastic waistband with a drawcord ensures a secure, adjustable fit, making these joggers versatile for both casual and athletic activities. Discover consistent sizing and lasting quality with these must-have men's cargo sweatpants. Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men's must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.
